name: unacquainted
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
not knowing or being familiar with a person: Marta and Toni were unacquainted. All of the people in the group were previously unacquainted. unacquainted with something
unfamiliar with something, because you have not studied it or experienced it before: I am unacquainted with her work.
See more Opposite
acquainted
More examplesFewer examplesI was unacquainted with the other people in the room.I was a stranger in the town and unacquainted with its alleys and side streets.She is unacquainted with the Dutch legal system.
